snippet: A document released on Monday by the trustee overseeing the return of more than $1 billion in missing customer money takes Jon S. Corzine and others at the firm to task for the firm’s downfall.
abstract: A document released on Monday by the trustee overseeing the return of more than $1 billion in missing customer money takes Jon S. Corzine and others at the firm to task for the firm’s downfall.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: Trustee Report Details Possible Claims Against Corzine and Others
headline.print_headline: MF Global Executives May Face Suits in Trustee’s Bid to Recover Cash
